quest.name: Best Delivered Cold
journal:
 Quest Sync
The commissary officer has her hands full, and is in need of an extra pair.
objectives: Speak with the commissary officer and have her accompany you.
Speak with the commissary officer at the designated locations.
Speak with the commissary officer at Tapper's Den.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: Well, well, now here's a sight that warms the heart. I never thought I'd have the honor to meet a hero of your pedigree, let alone beg for your aid.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: You see, I've got a shipment of supplies to send down to Tapper's Den, and having someone who knows the lay of the land by my side would go a long way to ensure its safe delivery.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: I'd defend it myself, but I have to carry the bloody thing! If you'd be so kind as to escort me, I assure you I'll make it worth your while.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: Well then, I'll be waiting outside the gates of the camp. Come meet me when you're ready, but don't take too long─monsters abound in these parts.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: There you are─I knew you'd have the heart to help a soul in need.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The commissary officer is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can leave the commissary officer behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: If you wish to have the commissary officer accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you do?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Discuss the Magna Glacies.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Discuss the ceruleum bergs.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Speak with the commissary officer.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Part ways with the commissary officer.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Nothing.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: It'll be some time yet before we've mapped the entirety of this vast expanse. It stretches north as far as the eye can see, unhospitable to even the hardiest of explorers.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: It's a wonder that the Garleans survived at all, let alone went on to form the Empire. Seeing the Magna Glacies with my own eyes, however, I've gained some understanding of their disposition.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: This is only hearsay, but I've been told those masses are formed when ceruleum bursts forth from the earth and comes into contact with the surrounding water, freezing instantly and capturing that moment of violence forevermore.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: The water mixed in it prevents the ceruleum from being set aflame, so we can't use it as fuel without refinement. The amount of ceruleum you get after all that work is barely worth the trouble.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: Pure ceruleum is wrested straight from the earth. That's what those rigs you see off in the distance are doing, or so I've heard.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: Oh, my friends aren't going to believe who's protecting me! I'll be telling this story when I'm in my cups for moons to come!

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: Are you sure you wish to part ways with the commissary officer?

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: Of course, I understand you must have many duties to attend to. Well, the supplies won't perish any time soon, so when you've finished with your business, you can find me at Camp Broken Glass.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: Welcome back. I trust you've finished your heroics? Shall we set forth for Tapper's Den?

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: Here we are, safe and sound. I couldn't have done it without you, friend!

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: Now all that's left is to deliver the goods. Let's enter those caves and get some shelter from these freezing winds, eh?

dialogue.name: JARECK
dialogue.text: That trek couldn't have been an easy one, what with the monsters and the cold and everything else besides. It ain't worth much, but you have my thanks.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: Well, the goods have been safely delivered, but... I'm afraid I have one more task to beg of you.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: Of course, I'd do it myself if I could, but I'm afraid this calls for someone with skills that I lack.

dialogue.name: BLONDESUPPLYMEMBER04216
dialogue.text: You're not obligated to help me again, but seeing as how you're already here, maybe you won't mind hearing me out.
